logging_database_location = f"abfss://synapse@{storage_account}synapse/workspaces/pins-synw-odw-dev-uks/warehouse/"
standardised_database_location = f"abfss://synapse@{storage_account}synapse/workspaces/pins-synw-odw-dev-uks/warehouse/"
harmonised_database_location = f"abfss://synapse@{storage_account}synapse/workspaces/pins-synw-odw-dev-uks/warehouse/"
curated_database_location = f"abfss://synapse@{storage_account}synapse/workspaces/pins-synw-odw-dev-uks/warehouse/"
curated_migration_database_location = f"abfss://odw-curated-migration@{storage_account}"
config_database_location = f"abfss://synapse@{storage_account}synapse/workspaces/pins-synw-odw-dev-uks/warehouse/"

spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS logging LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_standardised_db LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_db LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS odw_curated_migration_db LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
spark.sql(f"CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS config LOCATION '{logging_database_location}'")
